column3: â€œTalk about a good mood blast strain. If youâ€™re having a rough day smoke a fatty blunt of Wheres My Bike and youâ€™ll be making yourself laugh and smile. Such a nice happy & awake high to get you through the day.â€

â€œI'm over here in Indiana and I've had this from Spokane Washington and holy shit this strain put my dick in the dirt and I'm stoked to finally see its lineage I've spoke of this this strain to all my friends in this gay ass illegal state of Indiana about this magical strain and they've all called me crazy and that no such strain exists this in my opinion is even better than gods bud and if I'm not mistaken I'd like t...â€

â€œWhere's My Bike is new stain we are growing for the first time.  She is a Sativa dominant strain from parents Amnesia and Biker's Kush.  This very surprising genetic is the first strain with CBG and THCV I've had , and this yields wandering, creative energy and overall bliss.â€

â€œGreat strain.  Sticky with a fantastic sweet and chem sort of aroma.  Easy on the lungs, super smooth, especially through a double perc bong.
Super happy, energetic, carefree high.

â€œThis is my favorite sativa. Ever. It gives me an intense and tingly body high, I think itâ€™s great for smoking with someone special, if you know what I mean. It takes a couple of minutes to kick in, and the high lasts for more than an hour. I love itâ€
